comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Seems like there is no reason to omit the word "Boat" on the negative in the caption. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bridge_of_boats

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog: Thanks for catching the omission of "boats" in the title.  We will add it back in when we update.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Original photo from Agence Meurisse at Gallica site, published 1914, with caption: Compiègne : un pont de bateaux construit par le Génie Français (boat bridge built by French engineering) Meurisse catalog number at middle left of Bain negative. gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b90418274

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Wystan:  Thanks for gathering other images of the Spahis.  artolog:  Thank you for matching this image with the one from Gallica.  We will add more details when we update.
